The decision came down to how best optimise Google's triumvirate of power( Eric Schmidt , Page and Sergey Brin ) to become a more adaptable enterprise. Larry, Sergey Brin and I have been talking for a long time about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making- and over the holidays we decided now was the right moment to make some changes to the way we are structured, Eric Schmidt said. While Page takes the helm of CEO, Eric Schmidt will be executive chairman where he said he will focus on "deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology

Outlook, a pilot program run from 2005-08 by Homeland Security and the Department of Defense which used sophisticated military radar along the border north of Spokane, Washington, to catch low-flying drug aircraft. Operation Outlook successfully identified air-related smuggling trends and patterns and organizations active in cross-border criminal activities along the Spokane sector, said a news release from Kirsten Gillibrand 's office. on "too many hands on the steering wheel." Donald Rumsfeld , who served as President Bush 's defense chief for six years after holding the the same job under president Gerald Ford in the 1970s, acknowledged that in a war, many things cost lives. But he had no regrets about his leadership of the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan- the latter now nearing its 10th anniversary. He refused to echo the regrets of another domineering defense secretary-
